title: Clothing Brand Marketing Website

requirements.text: Create a responsive clothing brand website with core marketing pages: Home, Collections (product listing), About, and Contact, with a persistent header navigation and footer across all pages.

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: Header includes brand logo/name and nav links to Home, Collections, About, Contact on desktop and a mobile-friendly menu on small screens.
Footer includes at least: copyright, social links (placeholders), and a short brand tagline.
All pages are responsive and usable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Routes or page views exist for Home, Collections, About, and Contact and are reachable via navigation.

requirements.text: Implement Home page sections suitable for a clothing brand: hero banner with headline and call-to-action, featured collections/products, and a brand values/USP section.

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: Home page has a hero section with a headline, short subtext, and a prominent CTA button that navigates to Collections.
Home page includes a featured products/collections section with at least 6 items displayed in a grid.
Home page includes a brand values/USP section with 3â€“4 concise points.

requirements.text: Implement a Collections page that displays a browsable product grid (using a simple in-app dataset) and a Product Details view (modal or separate page) showing images, description, price, sizes, and an "Add to Cart" button (cart can be client-side only).

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: Collections page shows a grid of products with image, name, and price.
Selecting a product opens a detail view with larger image, description, price, and selectable size options.
An Add to Cart action exists and updates a client-side cart indicator (e.g., count in header).
Cart state persists at least for the current session (e.g., local state; persistence optional).

requirements.text: Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email, message) that performs client-side validation and provides a clear success state without requiring a backend (e.g., using a mailto link or on-screen submission confirmation).

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields: name, email, message.
Client-side validation prevents submission with empty fields and invalid email format.
On submit, user sees a success confirmation state (and the app does not crash or navigate unexpectedly).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a fashion/clothing brand (colors, typography, spacing, components) and enforce it consistently across all pages and components.

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across buttons, headings, cards, and spacing.
Theme avoids default-looking styling and is applied uniformly across Home, Collections, About, and Contact.
No blue/purple-dominant palette is used unless required by assets.

requirements.text: Add generated brand visuals as static assets and use them in the UI (logo in header, hero image on Home, and at least one supporting lifestyle/banner image). Store assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: create a web site for clothing brand

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Logo is displayed in the site header.
Hero image is used in the Home hero section.
At least one additional generated image is used somewhere appropriate (e.g., About or Collections header).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; implement new UI and logic in new or non-immutable files.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor if any backend work is added later.
nonGoals: Implementing real payment processing or checkout.
Integrating third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Implementing a full admin dashboard/CMS for managing products.
Using external databases or third-party email delivery services.

required: Minimalist fashion brand logo, monochrome, clean geometric mark (brand-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Fashion editorial hero banner with neutral tones and ample negative space (hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png)
Lifestyle clothing photography-style banner with soft lighting and modern streetwear vibe (lifestyle-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
